summary: Recruit Serah Farron from Final Fantasy XIII to battle along side you!
descriptionHtml:
Hello and welcome to my second mod (ever!), featuring Serah Farron from Final Fantasy XIII. This is NOT a direct rip from the game, but instead a follower with a face I modeled to look like her. Most of her assets come from the vanilla game, with bits and pieces from other mods thrown in there.

Serah can be found in the Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun. She acts just like any other follower, and but has character specific spells available to her (listed below). She can be married. I highly recommend using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]UFO[/url] (Ultimate Follower Overhaul) as it allows you to turn off her magic if you're so inclined, as well as customize her inventory (and that's just the beginning!). Should you have any problems, be sure to include them in the comments.

Spell Data
I based her base spells off of her roles in Final Fantasy XIII-2 (Commando [not applicable to magic], Ravager, Sentinel). With that in mind, she uses:
- One handed Incinerate (Ravager)
- One handed Lightning Bolt (Ravager)
- One handed Ice Spike (Ravager)
- One handed Ebony Flesh (Sentinel)
- One handed Fast Healing (Just for convenience)
Why are these all one handed you say? Well, since she uses the Spellsword combat AI, she'll always dual wield a regular spell. Considering Prorat99's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32003]rather appropriate[/url] weapon exists, I think it's more appropriate for Serah to be able to wield both a sword and magic (and not entirely magic)

Required Mods:
You just need [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5152]Beautiful Hair Retexture[/url] 1.3, which was on this page, but has since been removed.[u]It can now be found [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!hhlAyCCB!3pMILGVA9LFObtOhRv0zRjLkfUMbV8-_9Wa1TcS3fok]here[/url]. [/u]

Load Order:
1. Beautiful Hair.esp
2. Lightningrace.esp
3. Serah Follower.esp (THIS MUST BE BELOW THE OTHER TWO)

Recommended Mods:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869]Covereyes[/url]
[url=https://sites.google.com/site/d412kkn16h7savegame/files]Face data used for screenshots[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6963]Serah's sister; Lightning[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65366/?]Lightning's face preset; compliments of Rambobrill[/url]

Some common problems:

Q: Why does her hair turn black in some environments?
A: That's because of the hair files, it's not something I can fix

Q: Why is there a neck seam!
A: Serah will use whatever face mods you use. I'm entirely sure if her body uses the same body as you do, but the neck seam has been remedied by some body texture replacers (CBBE comes to mind)

Q: Why doesn't she look like she does in the game! You're an awful replicator!
A: Sheesh that was harsh. I tried my best to make it as close to the pictures I was able to find of her. I can't be 100% accurate because the default body parts (specifically the eyes) aren't nearly close enough to the original

Q: Can I find her clothes/weapons anywhere? I saw that you had them in the screenshots!
A: Why yes you can. A quick google (hehe, maybe not quick) search can help you find them. I've already linked Prorat99's sword. Needless to say, you may need to wade through some japanese sites to find what you're looking for *cough*modtype*cough*

Q: Why do I need to download Beautiful Hair? Can't it just be included in this mod?
A: Yes it could have. But it isn't. On the bright side you can enjoy being a bulky orc warrior with cute pink hair.

Troubleshooting:

Got a CTD?
1. Did you check the load order?
2. Did you download Beautiful hair (link is above)

Does Sarah have greyish/white hair color?
1. This is a conflict with my Lightning follower. To fix this, your load order needs to look like this:
lightningrace.esp
lightning follower.esp
serah follower.esp
lightning race vampire.esp
2. Give HighDragonSlayer a cookie for finding the fix!
author: Dragonflame17
